title: Client Approves a Change Order
description: A client reviews a change order for a new patio and approves it.

tasks.description: Receive the client's approval for the pending change order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The approval is received and logged.

tasks.description: Update the status of the change order to 'Approved' in the project management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The change order status is updated.

tasks.description: Update the total project budget to include the cost of the approved change order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project budget is increased by the value of the change order.
